column1: Artificial Intelligence Principal - Insights and Intelligence
column2: Skill required:Artificial Intelligence Innovation - Research and Development (R&D)  Designation:Management Level - Manager  Job Location:Bengaluru  Qualifications:BE/BTech/MTech  Years of Experience:13 to 18 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Insights&Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. You will be required to utilize the existing frameworks, standards, patterns to create architectural foundation and services necessary for AI applications that scale from multi-user to enterprise-class and demonstrate yourself as an expert by actively blogging, publishing research papers, and creating awareness in this emerging area. The Artificial Intelligence Innovation team is responsible for the creation, deployment, and managing the operation of projects. They help build responsible AI solutions that benefit users, communities, and society at large, guided by core principles that help deliver desired outcomes while engendering trust. The team collaborates with business experts, research, and platform engineers for coming up with creative solutions. In Product Delivery, you will be responsible for Delivering the Product/Solution to the Client, which could also involve customizing the existing Product/Solution.  What are we looking for? Python (Programming Language)  Machine Learning  Natural Language Processing (NLP)  Deep Learning  GenAI / LLM / Prompt Engineering  Ability to perform under pressure  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Ability to understand business challenges  Focus on business outcomes and ability to work with different cross functional teams Roles and Responsibilities  Delivery of AI solutions at scale.  Industrialization and standardization of AI product/solutions.  Identify and assess complex business processes to identify AI opportunities resulting in client value creation.  Create viable techno-commercial solutions by conducting in-depth analysis/evaluation of variable factors.  Align with strategic direction set by senior management when establishing near-term goals.  Interact with senior management at a client and/or within Accenture to convey the desired plan of action and ready to accept an alternate approach.  Act independently to design methodologies and procedures on new assignments.  Flag risks to clients and Accenture stakeholders and propose action plans where needed.  Identify improvement opportunities to optimize processes, decrease costs and increase client value.  Manage medium - large sized cross functional teams involving client and third-party vendors to achieve the project end goals.  Manage the Team and Product/Solution from a Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) point of view.  Requires transformation mindset and eye for identification of automation/process improvement opportunities.  Ability to work in Waterfall or Agile or Hybrid model.  Aware of the best practices of Quality control in and outside your team, which would involve Unit Testing, Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing, and Stress/Performance Testing.  Please note this role may require you to work in rotational shifts.
column11: python, natural language processing, performance testing, machine learning, artificial intelligence, regression testing, unit testing, manual testing, sql, functional testing, java, integration testing, waterfall, user acceptance testing, agile, jira

column1: Artificial Intelligence Assoc Principal - Insights and Intelligence
column2: Skill required:Artificial Intelligence Innovation - Data Science  Designation:Management Level - Associate Manager  Job Location:Bengaluru  Qualifications:BE/BTech/MTech  Years of Experience:10 to 14 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Insights & Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. You will be required to utilize the existing frameworks, standards, patterns to create architectural foundation and services necessary for AI applications that scale from multi-user to enterprise-class and demonstrate yourself as an expert by actively blogging, publishing research papers, and creating awareness in this emerging area. The Artificial Intelligence Innovation team is responsible for the creation, deployment, and managing the operation of projects. They help build responsible AI solutions that benefit users, communities, and society at large, guided by core principles that help deliver desired outcomes while engendering trust. The team collaborates with business experts, research, and platform engineers for coming up with creative solutions. In this role, you will be working on the interdisciplinary field about scientific methods, processes and systems to extract knowledge or insights from data in various forms, either structured or unstructured.  What are we looking for? Python (Programming Language)  Machine Learning  Natural Language Processing (NLP)  Deep Learning  GenAI / LLM / Prompt Engineering  Ability to perform under pressure  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Ability to understand business challenges  Focus on business outcomes and ability to work with different cross functional teams Roles and Responsibilities  In this role, you need to analyze and solve moderately complex problems.  You will typically be creating new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures.  The role requires a clear understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals.  You will need to hold monthly meaningful conversations with team members to discuss performance, coaching and feedback, training needs, and career discussions.  You will need to monitor & drive team performance, including throughput and quality as per defined metrics.  Your primary upward interaction is with a direct supervisor or team leads.  You will generally interact with peers and/or management levels with clients or internal stakeholders.  You will be provided with minimal guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments.  Decisions that you make often impact the team in which they reside and occasionally impact other teams.  You would be managing medium-small sized teams and/or work efforts at a client or within Accenture.  Please note this role may require you to work in rotational shifts.
column11: python, natural language processing, machine learning, artificial intelligence, deep learning, bed, data analysis, mathematics, neural networks, teaching, training, sql, r, data science, predictive modeling, computer vision, coaching, lecturer activities

column1: S&C Global Network - AI - CFO & EV - Fraud Analytics - Manager
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Global Network Data & AI Practice :- CFO & EV - Fraud Analytics  Title :- Level 7 - Ind & Func AI Decision Science Manager Job location :- Bengaluru, Gurugram, Mumbai About S&C - Global Network :- Accenture Global Network - Data & AI practice help our clients grow their business in entirely new ways. Analytics enables our clients to achieve high performance through insights from data - insights that inform better decisions and strengthen customer relationships. From strategy to execution, Accenture works with organizations to develop analytic capabilities - from accessing and reporting on data to predictive modelling - to outperform the competition. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? Accenture CFO & EV team under Data & AI team has comprehensive suite of capabilities in Risk, Fraud, Financial crime, and Finance. Within risk realm, our focus revolves around the model development, model validation, and auditing of models. Additionally, our work extends to ongoing performance evaluation, vigilant monitoring, meticulous governance, and thorough documentation of models. Get to work with top financial clients globally Access resources enabling you to utilize cutting-edge technologies, fostering innovation with the world's most recognizable companies. Accenture will continually invest in your learning and growth and will support you in expanding your knowledge. You'll be part of a diverse and vibrant team collaborating with talented individuals from various backgrounds and disciplines continually pushing the boundaries of business capabilities, fostering an environment of innovation. Qualification What you would do in this role Engagement Execution  Lead client engagements that may involve model development, validation, governance, strategy, transformation, implementation and end-to-end delivery of fraud analytics/management solutions for Accenture's clients. Advise clients on a wide range of Fraud Management/ Analytics initiatives. Projects may involve Fraud Management advisory work for CXOs, etc. to achieve a variety of business and operational outcomes. Develop and frame Proof of Concept for key clients, where applicable Practice Enablement Mentor, groom and counsel analysts and consultants. Support development of the Practice by driving innovations, initiatives. Develop thought capital and disseminate information around current and emerging trends in Fraud Analytics and Management Support efforts of sales team to identify and win potential opportunities by assisting with RFPs, RFI. Assist in designing POVs, GTM collateral. Travel:Willingness to travel up to 40% of the time Professional Development Skills:Project Dependent Who we are looking for? 7+ years of relevant Fraud Analytics experience at one or more Financial Services firms, or Professional Services / Risk Advisory with significant exposure to one or more of the following areas: Banking Fraud, Payment Fraud, Credit Card Fraud, Retail Fraud, Anti Money Laundering, Financial Crime, Telecom Fraud, Energy Fraud, Insurance Claims Fraud etc. Advanced skills in development and validation of fraud analytics models, strategies, visualizations. Understanding of new/ evolving methodologies/tools/technologies in the Fraud management space. Expertise in one or more domain/industry including regulations, frameworks etc. Experience in building models using AI/ML methodologies Modeling:Experience in one or more of analytical tools such as SAS, R, Python, SQL, etc. Knowledge of data processes, ETL and tools/ vendor products such as VISA AA, FICO Falcon, EWS, RSA, IBM Trusteer, SAS AML, Quantexa, Ripjar, Actimize etc. Proven experience in one of data engineering, data governance, data science roles Experience in Generative AI or Central / Supervisory banking is a plus. Strong conceptual knowledge and practical experience in the Development, Validation and Deployment of ML/AL models Hands-on programming experience with any of the analytics tools and visualization tools (Python, R, PySpark, SAS, SQL, PowerBI/ Tableau) Knowledge of big data, ML ops and cloud platforms (Azure/GCP/AWS) Strong written and oral communication skills Project management skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks concurrently Strong delivery experience of short and long term analytics projects

column2: Role Description Deutsche CIB Centre Pvt Ltd is Deutsche banks global platform for front-office & aligned functions to create value by utilizing non-traditional locations, exceptional talent, and a collaborative culture. This branch of Deutsche Bank Group company is looking for extremely bright candidates for the role of Debt Strategic Analytics (Strats). The candidate is required to work in close collaboration with London/Singapore teams on various quantitative and regulatory driven projects. Candidate is required to understand the business problem, gather information required for the implementation and provide an end-to-end optimized solution on a scalable platform. Implementation of the project needs to be done in Python and C++ programming language. Candidate should possess excellent English communication skills to coordinate and communicate effectively with various stakeholders spread across the globe. Your key responsibilities The Quantitative Strategist (Quant Strat) is responsible for designing, developing and implementing through analytical (quantitative) and direct coding (e.g., via C++; Python or any other relevant application), quantitative strategic models, risk management (credit risk, market risk, anti-financial crime etc.) and pricing solutions to meet business & control needs and drive respective strategies or regulatory adherence. Some responsibilities for this role include, but not limited to: Centralization and automation of end of the day pricing and risk calculation for Fixed Income Emerging Markets (EM) business. Develop a framework to aggregate daily funding requirements for entire EM Debt business and allocation of funding cost to different desks within the business. Develop a dashboard to execute, monitor and analyze internal funding trades b/w Treasury and Debt, and funding book and desks. Hedge Funding Risk for Rates books and sweep that into centralized Risk Management books. Work on implementation of regulatory driven projects like AQR (Asset Quality Review) and Liquidity reserve calculations for the business. Build quant driven tools and products for front-office and control functions. Coordinate and gather information from various stakeholders for deeper understanding of the business. Develop and design tables and databases required for storage of the data. Design an automated solution which is optimized and scalable. Your skills and experience Strong programming skills in C++ and Python preferably in financial industry. Relevant experience of at least 8 years in Banking or Software Development. At least 3+ year experience with relational database design (oracle, mysql). Strong understanding of Data Structures & Algorithms, memory optimization etc. Good quantitative skills in Probability, Calculus, and Linear Algebra. Experience with applied econometrics (Hypothesis testing, PCA, Linear/Non-Linear Regression etc.) is a plus. Knowledge of applied linear/Integer linear programming, dynamic programming & greedy algorithms is a plus. Relevant experience in some of financial products like Bonds, Swaps, Cross Currency Swaps, Loans & Deposits is a plus. Strong communication skills and presentation ability with attention to detail. Good problem-solving instincts and strong analytical skills. Strong educational background in Engineering/Science, preferably from top tier colleges in India.
column10: Investment Banking / Venture Capital / Private Equity
column11: Lead Quantitative, C++, Software Development, Probability, Calculus, Linear Algebra, Python

Empower the business by creating value through the increased adoption of data, data science, and business intelligence landscape. Collaborate with internal clients (data science and product teams) to drive solutions and POC discussions. Develop and optimize procedures to productionalize data engineering pipelines. Research in state-of-the-art methodologies. Create documentation for learning and knowledge transfer. Create and audit reusable packages or libraries. Key Skills/Experience Required : -  2+ years of overall technology experience that includes at least 2+ years of hands-on software development, data engineering. 2+ years of experience in SQL optimization and performance tuning, and development experience in programming languages like Python, PySpark, Scala, etc.). Experience with version control systems like Github and deployment & CI tools. Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and building high-volume ETL/ELT pipelines. Working knowledge of agile development, including DevOps and DataOps concepts. Thorough knowledge in Spark, SQL, Python, Databricks and Azure Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, and the ability to influence and demonstrate confidence in communications with senior level management. Comfortable with change, especially that which arises through company growth.nt. Proactively drive impact and engagement while bringing others along. Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new skills. Differentiating Competencies Required : -  Strong problem-solving, analytical, and critical thinking skills Ability to collaborate in cross-functional teams Ability to manage multiple projects and report simultaneously across different stakeholders in a fast-paced environment Excellent verbal and written communication skills Strong attention to detail

column2: Engaging with clients and ZS teams to comprehend and articulate scientific questions, translating them into actionable insights and analyses.         Applying a scientific mindset to identify and test hypotheses, drawing on extensive experience in wet lab experimentation and protocol development.         Utilizing in-depth knowledge of data, systems, process flows, and procedures to provide analyses and recommendations on client projects.         Demonstrating a profound understanding of the drug discovery process, pre-clinical studies, animal models, and related areas.         Serving as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in technology projects focused on scientific research, data analysis, and computational biology.         Contributing to the development of tools and platforms that confer sustained competitive advantage to ZS in scientific consulting and research studies.         Collaborating with technology team in building research platforms, research data models, and data lakes.         Synthesizing findings, formulating recommendations, and effectively communicating results to clients and internal teams.         Taking a leadership role in designing and executing analyses to test hypotheses, enhancing client scientific effectiveness.         Leading project task execution by ensuring progress, organizing project data, and coordinating team meetings.         Conducting issue analysis and developing hypotheses on key client issues.         Collaborating with project leadership to meticulously define project scope and develop strategic approaches.         Offering thought leadership and fostering innovation within projects and practice areas.         Actively participating in business development initiatives.         Serving as a coach and mentor to junior team members, fostering their professional development.                       What      you'll     Bring           :                 Medical degree, PhD, or masters degree in science, computational genomics, genetics, molecular biology, cell biology, systems biology, immunology, or related discipline, with a strong academic record in analytic and quantitative coursework.         Proficiency in various data domains such as OMICS (genomics, proteomics), translational, clinical trials, real-world data, medical devices data, and digital pathology.         Expertise in research and translational data standards, medical terminologies, and controlled vocabularies (eg, ICD, NDC, SNOMED, MedDRA, LOINC, CPT, CDISC, OMICS, DICOM) used in healthcare data and ontologies.         Understanding of tools and platforms required for the analysis of omicsdata, lab instrument data (eg, flow cytometry, mass spectrometry), and translational data.         Accumulated 4-8 years of pertinent work experience, showcasing extensive expertise in handling scientific data and delivering data management projects.         Proven experience contributing to the development of data models and data products for scientific research data.         Deep understanding of various research/ analytical use cases of various scientific data         Basic- Medium proficiency and hands-on experience working with AWS, SQL, Databricks, and R.         High motivation, strong work ethic, maturity, and personal initiative.         Proficient understanding of project delivery concepts, encompassing methodologies like Agile and Waterfall, to effectively drive project completion.         Experience as a Subject Matter Expert or Business Analyst within cross-functional teams.         Aptitude for and enjoyment of leading and managing teams.         Strong oral and written communication skills, enabling impactful interactions with senior-level decision-makers.         Strong attention to detail, with a quality-focused mindset.         Analytic problem-solving skills with a creative and innovative outlook.         Client service orientation.             Perks Benefits:           ZS offers a comprehensive total rewards package including health and well-being, financial planning, annual leave, personal growth and professional development. Our robust skills development programs, multiple career progression options and internal mobility paths and collaborative culture empowers you to thrive as an individual and global team member.             We are committed to giving our employees a flexible and connected way of working. A flexible and connected ZS allows us to combine work from home and on-site presence at clients/ZS offices for the majority of our week. The magic of ZS culture and innovation thrives in both planned and spontaneous face-to-face connections.

column2: Were seeking a highly motivated Full-Stack Data Analyst to join us     Youll bridge data analysis and development, unlocking datas potential with advanced analytics and cutting-edge Generative AI     Use your Python, Azure, and Generative AI skills to create innovative solutions           Preferred Skills:          6+ years of experience in Data Science with a strong foundation in Python, machine learning libraries and Generative AI models.      Hands-on experience in developing, and testing applications using Generative AI for tasks like text summarization, text categorization, content creation, and question answering.      Collaborate with partners to understand business needs and translate them into innovative data-driven solutions, exploring the power of Generative AI to create novel approaches.      Use your experience in Python, Machine Learning (ML), and cloud platforms (Microsoft Azure / AWS) involving structured and unstructured data, including text data.      Acquire data from primary or secondary sources and maintain databases/data systems.      Develop and implement data science solutions using Python and Azure Machine Learning services, integrating Generative AI models where applicable.      Deploy user-facing applications using frameworks like Django, Flask, or Streamlit to visualize and work with data science solutions, machine learning models, and Generative AI functionalities.      You will report to Group Manager, Global Analytics.      You will be eligible for the Full-time employee benefits like medical insurance coverage as per the policy          Good to have:          Contribute to the implementation of ML/LLM Ops practices for model deployment and management, ensuring continuous improvement and monitoring of machine learning models and Generative AI solutions.      Continuously research and recommend advancements in ML and Generative AI to improve team productivity, model performance, and overall data strategy.      Have experience communicating updates and resolutions to customers and other partners to collaborate with teams and translate complex technical concepts into clear and applicable insights.          Full-Stack Development Lifecycle:    Collaborate with the manager throughout the project lifecycle to design, develop, test, deploy, and maintain data-driven applications using machine learning models and Generative AI.        Data Exploration & Analysis:    Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA), create data visualizations, and conduct statistical analysis to support model development.        ML & Generative AI Development:    Build, train, evaluate, and deploy machine learning models and Generative AI models using Python and Azure Machine Learning services.        Communication & Reporting:    Generate reports and present findings on data analysis and the potential of Generative AI solutions.        Technology Exploration & Innovation:    Evaluate emerging datasets, technologies (eg, new Generative AI techniques), and tools that can potentially enhance the analytical platform and future data-driven solutions.

column2: Niveus Solutions is looking for an Associate Director In this role, ?you will work on a broad range of cutting-edge data analytics and machine learning problems across a variety of industries. This role involves a combination of customer engagement and technical team management  ?     15+ yrs experience in delivering data analytics solutions / services   Ability to understand business problems, articulate, ideate & converge on solution approach and develop analytical solutions with measurable Business outcomes   Ability to project yourself as a technical decision maker and thought leader in the data analytics space   Ability to identify new opportunities and extend existing opportunities. Convert capability to revenue stream that can be offered to clients as offerings   Ability to work across multiple clients and projects and lead/mentor team members   Experience in working on cloud platforms (e.g. AWS/AZURE/GCP), big data systems (e.g. Databricks, BigQuery, Snowflake), realtime and batch data ingestion tools, DBT, visualization tools(Tableau, Qlik, Power BI), data governance tools, data mesh, data fabric, AI/ML/Gen AI solutions, etc      Roles and Responsibilities     Manage and provide technical leadership to large data programs or multiple programs implementation based on the requirement using agile technologies   Building roadmap, strategy for delivery of various projects while being a trusted partner for clients/stakeholders. Engage with clients to understand their business context and act as a Subject Matter Expert   Establishing long-term relationships with clients and securing repeat business from existing clients   Lead a team of data/ML architects and business analysts to embed AI and analytics into the business decision processes.   Ensure adequate skills to manage deliveries   Provide presales support as well as guide customer engineering teams for analytics opportunities including RFPs/RFIs. Present / Position the right Solution architecture to the client to ensure a higher deal conversion ratio

column1: Head Analytics & Data Science For a Financial Services in Chennai
column2: Role & responsibilities   Head of Analytics & Data Science Team, you will Play a Central role in the complete Analytics Function of the organization, which is to champion the use of data and data science techniques in various decisions of every department, thereby materially impacting business KPIs through analytics. Your role will be setting the data & analytics vision, stakeholder interaction, problem scoping, analytic solution design & deployment; along with ensuring the management and growth of the analytics team   Work with the top management, business and function heads to identify the most valuable problems to solve. Also proactively identify and suggest analytic initiatives that can have major impact on the company performance Work closely with internal teams / stakeholders to design analytical approaches to solve business problems. Develop and enhance a broad range of cutting-edge Data Analytics and Machine Learning solutions. Setting up / enhancing data collection procedures from the business as well as external sources. Oversee the work of the team in various aspects of the ML ecosystem feature engineering, model building, ML pipelines, logging & versioning, documentation, scaling, deployment, monitoring and maintenance. Lead a team of data scientists and engineers to embed ML/AI and analytics into the business processes and decisions Source, Train and Grow the team so as to form the next set of mature data scientists and analytic consultants, thereby widening the reach of the team. Wear the hat of a Mentor too. Establish a close working relationship with the top leaders of the company so as to play an advisory role for any analytic possibilities. Proactively reach out and contribute. Be comfortable staring with vague and unclear problems, and gradually add clarity through continuous interaction with different business leaders. Evangelize Analytics across the organization through various avenues with the help of the senior leadership, to establish a data driven thinking among all teams. Enable and advise IT teams on creating the right Analytic Tech stack and Deployment strategies Preferred candidate profile     Strong leadership and management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire a team Experience in leading data science teams to execute projects. Experience designing data science solutions to business problems Deep understanding of ML algorithms for common classification / regression use cases, with hands-on past experience in designing, developing and deploying. High level of proficiency in a structured programming language, e.g. Python, R  Good understanding of data querying / SQL Good understanding of ML model deployments and monitoring Exposure to data visualization tools and techniques. Comfortable with large scale data processing Experience in Financial Services will be add on. Good Communication & Leadership skills. Share your profile to yuvaraju@prodigyrecruit.com or call 9884286090 for more information.

column2: PID/s Load Mapping: Position Summary MetLife established a Data and Analytics center in Hyderabad to scale and mature Data and Analytics capabilities in a cost-effective manner and make MetLife future ready. The center is integral to Global Data and Analytics talent strategy with a focus to protect & build MetLife IP, promote reusability and drive experimentation and innovation. The team in India mirrors the global DnA team with focus across Data science, Enterprise business intelligence, Data Governance, Data Quality, Solutions Engineering and Agile Delivery. In partnership with Business, IT, DnA colleagues in other geographies, the team has been delivering data & analytics solutions for the Enterprise across lines of businesses, corporate functions, markets, and products.   Role Value Proposition   To drive the development and delivery of end-to-end data and analytics solutions for key insurance business functions such as claims service &operations, customer acquisition, customer engagement & retention, distribution, investments, marketing, risk management and underwriting. The role will collaborate with partners from Business, operations, technology and risk management functions to develop scalable and responsible AI solutions. Job Responsibilities Drive business transformation using Data, Analytics and AI  Lead all stages of Data, analytics & AI product development life cycle: from problem identification, conceptualization, prioritization to solution development and delivery.  Collaborate with business and technology partners to co-create solutions anchored on customer care, human-centered design, frictionless services, and meaningful engagement.   Engage in open-ended conversations, navigate through ambiguous situations and develop clarity. Develop Data and Analytics roadmaps. Deliver solutions with transformational impact to the Enterprise. Communicate, engage, and present roadmaps, use cases, solutions, & impact to executive/senior management. Deliver products and solutions in a timely, proactive, and entrepreneurial manner. Institutionalize best practices, contribute to research and experimentation efforts. Accelerate solution delivery using re-usable frameworks, prototypes and hackathons. People leadership: talent acquisition, coaching and mentoring team.    Education, Technical Skills & Other Critical Requirement Education Bachelors/ Master?? degree in an information technology/computer science or relevant domain. MBA or financial services industry experience preferred; Experience   (In Years)  12-18+ years of relevant experience in data and analytics product & solution delivery Technical Skills Traditional as well as modern statistical and machine learning techniques Azure ML, OpenAI, Python, PyTorch , SQL, and TensorFlow. Experience working with large and complex internal, external, structured, and unstructured datasets. Responsible deployment of AI. Technical documentation for solutions. Solution Engineering and Consultative skills: Strong conceptual and creative problem-solving skills; empathy led engagement with focus on stakeholder motivation, needs and aspirations.  Agile methodologies & tools. Excellent written, verbal communication skills and presentation skills; engage in meaningful manner with variety of audience: business stakeholders, technology partners & practitioners, executive and senior management. Proven record in driving data & analytics/digital transformation in large organizations Industry knowledge about emerging AI trends, AI tools and technologies Other Critical Requirements Preferred:   New age AI and ML techniques such as GenAI, foundational models, large language models (LLMs) and applications ML Ops, AI Ops, Generative AI, Ethical AI, AI in cloud(Azure, AWS, Google Could Platform etc) Management consulting experience  Data management, Data engineering, Data governance, Data operations, Data on Cloud
